pages.text: An Upgrade Workbench is used for upgrading devices and for adding spells to spell gems. Anything that can be upgraded will have "$(8)Upgradeable$()" in its tooltip (like a Soul Essence Staff).$(br2)To create an Upgrade Workbench, build the pictured structure and right click one of the blocks with a Soul Essence Staff.

pages.name: Upgrade Workbench
pages.text: Creating an Upgrade Workbench requires 10 light soul essence and 10 dark soul essence.
